about.title: About
about.description: A serene abode amid natures incredible beauty and just a stone's throw away from the cascading waters. It is surrounded with lush green forest and a magnificient view of sunset. Our camping site is located at the backwaters of KRS dam. It is a favourite camp for those adrenaline junkies. Camp Space: Rocky terrain with patches of grass host the campers to camp their tents. The camp space comes with the astounding view of calm backwater and forest.

whyUs.description: We believe in experiential travel where our guests at Camp are explorers. We will personalize your stay, help you track wildlife and offer you activities no one else can.
